rules.description: Workflow fires when Campaign Member has been sent the final nurture campaign email (Email 4).
Works in conjunction with the Marketo / Enroll in Campaign Pilot to identify when someone clicks on a link in emails 2-4
rules.formula: AND( ISCHANGED( Status ), OR( ISPICKVAL(Status, "Email 2 Responded"), ISPICKVAL(Status, "Email 3 Responded"), ISPICKVAL(Status, "Email 4 Responded") ) )
